title: Manage Operator Fatigue
description: A dispatcher uses a fatigue monitoring system to detect when a haul truck operator may be drowsy and need a break.

tasks.description: Receive an alert from the in-cab camera system that the operator of truck HT-12 is showing signs of fatigue (e.g., microsleeps).
tasks.expected_outcome: A high-priority fatigue alert is received.

tasks.description: Contact the operator via radio to check on them.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator confirms they are feeling tired.

tasks.description: Instruct the operator to pull over in a safe location and take a short break. Assign another truck to their shovel in the meantime.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator takes a break, mitigating the safety risk, and production is minimally impacted.
